languages.text: "Ваша Светлость, с Януса докладывают о бедствии — призрачных ксеносских фигурах, возникающих из закатных сумерек и исчезающих с рассветом. Каждую ночь хищным роем они атакуют по одному агрокомплексу, и все, чего касаются призраки, замерзает. Нападения происходят в комплексах, приближенных к ныне неподконтрольному сектору планеты, в котором природа восстала против нас".

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, Janus is reporting about a disaster — ghostly xenos figures that appear at dusk and go away at dawn. In a ravenous swarm, they attack one agricultural facility each night, freezing everything they touch. The attacks take place in the complexes closest to the uncontrolled sector of the planet, where nature itself has turned against us."
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость, с Януса докладывают о бедствии — призрачных ксеносских фигурах, возникающих из закатных сумерек и исчезающих с рассветом. Каждую ночь хищным роем они атакуют по одному агрокомплексу, и все, чего касаются призраки, замерзает. Нападения происходят в комплексах, приближенных к ныне неподконтрольному сектору планеты, в котором природа восстала против нас".

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, Janus is reporting about a disaster — the ghostly xenos figures that appear at dusk and go away at dawn. In a ravenous swarm, they attack one agricultural facility each night, freezing everything they touch. The attacks take place in the complexes that are the closest to the currently uncontrolled sector of the planet, where the nature has turned against us."

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, Janus is reporting about a disaster — the ghostly xenos figures that appear at dusk and go away at dawn. In a ravenous swarm, they attack one agricultural facility each night, freezing everything they touch. The attacks take place in the complexes that are the closest to the currently uncontrolled sector of the planet, where the nature has turned against us."

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, Janus is reporting about a disaster — ghostly xenos figures that appear at dusk and go away at dawn. In a ravenous swarm, they attack one agricultural facility each night, freezing everything they touch. The attacks take place in the complexes closest to the only currently untamed sector of the planet, where nature itself has turned against us."

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, Janus is reporting about a disaster — ghostly xenos figures that appear at dusk and go away at dawn. In a ravenous swarm, they attack one agricultural facility each night, freezing everything they touch. The attacks take place in the complexes closest to the only currently untamed sector of the planet, where nature itself has turned against us."

In a ravenous swarm, they attack one agricultural facility each night, freezing everything they touch. The attacks take place in the complexes closest to the uncontrolled sector of the planet, where nature itself has turned against us."

In a ravenous swarm, they attack one agricultural facility each night, freezing everything they touch. The attacks take place in the complexes closest to the uncontrolled sector of the planet, where nature itself has turned against us."

languages.text: “大人，我们收到报告，说加努斯发生了灾难。幽灵般的异形生物在黄昏时分出现，而后在黎明到来时消失。它们结成贪婪的集群，每晚都会袭击一座农业设施，冻结它们所接触到的一切。目前，整颗行星只有一片区域还没有处于控制下，而所有的袭击都发生在离那片区域最近的建筑群中。那里的大自然本身正在反抗我们。”
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, Janus is reporting about a disaster — ghostly xenos figures that appear at dusk and go away at dawn. In a ravenous swarm, they attack one agricultural facility each night, freezing everything they touch. The attacks take place in the complexes closest to the uncontrolled sector of the planet, where nature itself has turned against us."

traits.locale_text: “大人，我们收到报告，说加努斯发生了灾难。幽灵般的异形生物在黄昏时分出现，而后在黎明到来时消失。它们结成贪婪的集群，每晚都会袭击一座农业设施，冻结它们所接触到的一切。目前，整颗行星只有一片区域还没有处于控制下，而所有的袭击都发生在离那片区域最近的建筑群中。那里的大自然本身正在反抗我们。”

languages.text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, Janus nos informa de una catástrofe: figuras xenos fantasmales que aparecen al anochecer y desaparecen al amanecer. Como un enjambre voraz, atacan una instalación agrícola cada noche, congelando todo lo que tocan. Los ataques tienen lugar en los complejos más cercanos al sector indómito del planeta, donde la propia naturaleza se ha vuelto contra nosotros».
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, Janus is reporting about a disaster — ghostly xenos figures that appear at dusk and go away at dawn. In a ravenous swarm, they attack one agricultural facility each night, freezing everything they touch. The attacks take place in the complexes closest to the uncontrolled sector of the planet, where nature itself has turned against us."

traits.locale_text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, Janus nos informa de una catástrofe: figuras xenos fantasmales que aparecen al anochecer y desaparecen al amanecer. Como un enjambre voraz, atacan una instalación agrícola cada noche, congelando todo lo que tocan. Los ataques tienen lugar en los complejos más cercanos al sector indómito del planeta, donde la propia naturaleza se ha vuelto contra nosotros».

languages.text: 「陛下、ヤヌスから災害についての報告が届きました...夕暮れに現れ、夜明けに去っていく亡霊のようなゼノについてです。貪欲な大群で現れ、毎晩1か所の農業施設を襲い、触れたものすべてを凍らせていくようです。攻撃を受けた施設は、現在、惑星で唯一未開のセクターに最も近い場所にあります。そこは、自然そのものが私たちに敵対しています」
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, Janus is reporting about a disaster — ghostly xenos figures that appear at dusk and go away at dawn. In a ravenous swarm, they attack one agricultural facility each night, freezing everything they touch. The attacks take place in the complexes closest to the uncontrolled sector of the planet, where nature itself has turned against us."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、ヤヌスから災害についての報告が届きました...夕暮れに現れ、夜明けに去っていく亡霊のようなゼノについてです。貪欲な大群で現れ、毎晩1か所の農業施設を襲い、触れたものすべてを凍らせていくようです。攻撃を受けた施設は、現在、惑星で唯一未開のセクターに最も近い場所にあります。そこは、自然そのものが私たちに敵対しています」
「陛下、ヤヌスから災害についての報告が届きました...夕暮れに現れ、夜明けに去っていく亡霊のようなゼノについてです。貪欲な大群で現れ、毎晩1か所の農業施設を襲い、触れたものすべてを凍らせていくようです。攻撃を受けた施設は、現在、惑星で唯一未開のセクターに最も近い場所にあります。そこは、自然そのものが私たちに敵対しています」

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie, une terrible catastrophe frappe actuellement Janus : des créatures éthérées d'origine xénos déferlent sur la planète à la nuit tombée et disparaissent à l'aube. Emportées par leur danse meurtrière, elles gèlent instantanément tout ce qu'elles touchent et démolissent une nouvelle installation agricole chaque nuit. Leurs assauts visent les complexes mitoyens du seul secteur incontrôlé de la planète, où la nature s'est rebellée contre nous. »
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, Janus is reporting about a disaster — ghostly xenos figures that appear at dusk and go away at dawn. In a ravenous swarm, they attack one agricultural facility each night, freezing everything they touch. The attacks take place in the complexes closest to the uncontrolled sector of the planet, where nature itself has turned against us."

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie, une terrible catastrophe frappe actuellement Janus : des créatures éthérées d'origine xénos déferlent sur la planète à la nuit tombée et disparaissent à l'aube. Emportées par leur danse meurtrière, elles gèlent instantanément tout ce qu'elles touchent et démolissent une nouvelle installation agricole chaque nuit. Leurs assauts visent les complexes mitoyens du seul secteur incontrôlé de la planète, où la nature s'est rebellée contre nous. »

languages.text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, Janus meldet eine Katastrophe ... gespenstische Xenos, die am Abend auftauchen und am Morgen wieder verschwinden. Als hungriger Schwarm greifen sie Nacht für Nacht landwirtschaftliche Anlagen an und lassen alles zu Eis erstarren, was sie berühren. Die Angriffe ereignen sich in den Komplexen unweit des unkontrollierten Sektors des Planeten, wo sich die Natur selbst gegen uns gewandt hat."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, Janus is reporting about a disaster — ghostly xenos figures that appear at dusk and go away at dawn. In a ravenous swarm, they attack one agricultural facility each night, freezing everything they touch. The attacks take place in the complexes closest to the uncontrolled sector of the planet, where nature itself has turned against us."

traits.locale_text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, Janus meldet eine Katastrophe ... gespenstische Xenos, die am Abend auftauchen und am Morgen wieder verschwinden. Als hungriger Schwarm greifen sie Nacht für Nacht landwirtschaftliche Anlagen an und lassen alles zu Eis erstarren, was sie berühren. Die Angriffe ereignen sich in den Komplexen unweit des unkontrollierten Sektors des Planeten, wo sich die Natur selbst gegen uns gewandt hat."

"Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, Janus meldet eine Katastrophe — gespenstische Xenos-Gestalten, die in der Abenddämmerung auftauchen und im Morgengrauen wieder verschwinden. Als hungriger Schwarm greifen sie jede Nacht landwirtschaftliche Anlagen an und frieren alles ein, was sie berühren. Die Angriffe finden in den Anlagen nahe dem einzigen momentan ungezähmten Sektor des Planeten statt, wo sich die Natur selbst gegen uns gewandt hat."

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, Janus'tan gelen raporlarına göre orada bir felaket yaşanıyor. Hayaletvari zeno suretleri, alaca karanlıkta ortaya çıkıp şafakta kayboluyor. Açgözlü bir kurt sürüsü gibi her gece bir tarım tesisine saldırarak dokundukları her şeyi donduruyorlar. Saldırılar, gezegenin kontrol edilmeyen sektörlerine en yakın komplekslerde gerçekleşiyor. Buralarda tabiatın ta kendisi bize sırtını dönmüş hâlde."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, Janus is reporting about a disaster — ghostly xenos figures that appear at dusk and go away at dawn. In a ravenous swarm, they attack one agricultural facility each night, freezing everything they touch. The attacks take place in the complexes closest to the uncontrolled sector of the planet, where nature itself has turned against us."
